                                    //    setTimeout(() => { $('.close').click(); }, 5000);
                                    //});

                                    rmp.init(settings);
                                   }
                                </script>

                            </div>
                            <script type="text/javascript">
                                $(function () {
                                    var BannerCheck = localStorage.getItem('BannerActiveV2')
                                    if (BannerCheck != "True") {
                                        var overlay = $('<div id="SSS"></div>');
                                        overlay.show();
                                        overlay.appendTo(document.body);
                                        $('.popup').show();
                                        //setTimeout(() => { if (!document.querySelector('video') != null) { document.querySelector('video').muted = false; } }, 500);
                                    }
                                    else {
                                        document.body.style.overflow = 'auto';
                                    }

                                    $('.NoReplay').click(function () {
                                        if (document.querySelector('video') != null && document.querySelector('video') != undefined) {
                                            if (!document.querySelector('video').muted) {
                                                document.querySelector('video').muted = true;
                                            }
                                            if (document.querySelector('video').played) {
                                                document.querySelector('video').pause();
                                            }

                                        }
                                        $('.popup').hide();
                                        document.body.style.overflow = 'auto';
                                        overlay.appendTo(document.body).remove();
                                        localStorage.setItem('BannerActiveV2', 'True')
                                        return false;
                                    });

                                    $('.close').click(function () {
                                        if (document.querySelector('video') != null && document.querySelector('video') != undefined) {
                                            if (!document.querySelector('video').muted) {
                                                document.querySelector('video').muted = true;
                                            }
                                            if (document.querySelector('video').played) {
                                                document.querySelector('video').pause();
                                            }
                                        }
                                        $('.popup').hide();
                                        document.body.style.overflow = 'auto';
                                        overlay.appendTo(document.body).remove();
                                        return false;
                                    });
                                });
                            </script>
                        </div>
                    <p></p>
                </div>
            </div>

    <!-- Kulakçık başlangıç-->
        <script type="text/javascript">
            //$(document).ready(function () {

            //    var ua = navigator.userAgent;
            //    if (ua.indexOf("Android") != -1
            //        || ua.indexOf("PlayBook") != -1
            //        || ua.indexOf("Linux") != -1
            //        || ua.indexOf("BlackBerry") != -1
            //        || ua.indexOf("iPhone") != -1
            //        || ua.indexOf("BB10") != -1
            //        || ua.indexOf("Windows Phone") != -1
            //        || ua.indexOf("ASUS") != -1) {

            //        $("#gaziBanner").css("display", "none");
            //        $("#GaziSayacBanner").css("display", "block");
            //        $("#countdowncontainer").css("margin-top", "16px");
            //    }
            //    else {
            //        $("#gaziBanner").css("display", "block");
            //        $("#GaziSayacBanner").css("display", "none");
            //        $("#countdowncontainer").css("margin-top", "30px");
            //    }

            //    $("#pageflip").hover(function () {
            //        $("#pageflip img , .msg_block").stop().animate({
            //            width: '370px',
            //            height: '170px'
            //        }, 500);
            //        $(" .msg_block").stop().animate({
            //            width: '338px',
            //            height: '160px'
            //        }, 500);
            //    }, function () {
            //        $("#pageflip img").stop().animate({
            //            width: '175px',
            //            height: '135px'
            //        }, 220);
            //        $(".msg_block").stop().animate({
            //            width: '170px',
            //            height: '130px'
            //        }, 200);
            //    });
            //});
        </script>
        <script>
            $(document).ready(function () {

                var ua = navigator.userAgent;
                if (ua.indexOf("Mobile") > -1 || ua.indexOf("iPad") > -1 || ua.indexOf("Android") > -1 || isIpad()) {

                    $("#gaziBanner").css("display", "none");
                    $("#GaziSayacBanner").css("display", "block");
                    $("#countdowncontainer").css("margin-top", "16px");
                }
                else {
                    $("#gaziBanner").css("display", "block");
                    $("#GaziSayacBanner").css("display", "block");
                    $("#countdowncontainer").css("margin-top", "30px");
                }

                $("#pageflip").hover(function () {
                    $("#pageflip img , .msg_block").stop().animate({
                        width: '370px',
                        height: '170px'
                    }, 500);
                    $(" .msg_block").stop().animate({
                        width: '338px',
                        height: '160px'
                    }, 500);
                }, function () {
                    $("#pageflip img").stop().animate({
                        width: '175px',
                        height: '135px'
                    }, 220);
                    $(".msg_block").stop().animate({
                        width: '170px',
                        height: '130px'
                    }, 200);
                });
            });

        </script>

    <script type="text/javascript">
        $('#result-tabs-131').tabs('#result-panes-131 > div', {effect: 'ajax'}); var api = $('#result-tabs-131').data('tabs');api.click('#altiliSonuc');
    </script>
        <script type="text/javascript">
            var activeRace;
            var refreshIntervalTables = window.setInterval(function() {
                var $activeLink = $("ul#result-tabs-131 li a.current");
                var href = $activeLink.attr("href");
                var sehirId = ((href.split("?")[1]).split("&", 2))[0].split("=")[1];




            $.ajaxSetup({'cache':true});

                $.ajax({
                    url: href,
					cache:true,
                    beforeSend: function(request) {
                        request.setRequestHeader("Content-Hash", $("div.result-panes div input#DataHash").val());
			var lastUpdatedTime = new Date();
                        $("span#LastUpdated").html("(Son Güncelleme " + pad(lastUpdatedTime.getHours(), 2) + ":" + pad(lastUpdatedTime.getMinutes(), 2)+")");
                    },
                    complete: function(data, status) {
                        if (data.status == 200) {
                            var activeIndex = 0;
                            if ($activeLink.parent().index() > 2) { // there is another li which is not a part of the tabs
                             activeIndex = $activeLink.parent().index() - 1;
                            }

                            $('div#result-panes-' + sehirId + ' div').remove();
                            $(data.responseText).appendTo('div#result-panes-' + sehirId);

                            $('ul#result-tabs-' + sehirId).tabs('#result-panes-' + sehirId + ' >div', { effect: 'ajax', initialIndex:activeIndex });
                        } else {

                        }
                    }
                });
            }, 30000);
        </script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    $(document).ready(function () {
        

        var refreshIntervalRaces = window.setInterval(function () {
         
            var currentCity = $('a.race-city-active').text();
            var activeLi = $('.anasayfaHipodromTablar >li').find('a.race-city.race-city-active');
            var activeLink = activeLi.index('.anasayfaHipodromTablar >li >a');


            $.ajax({
               cache:true,
                url: "/TR/YarisSever/YarisSever/AnasayfaYarisBilgileri",
                beforeSend: function (request) {
                    request.setRequestHeader("Content-Hash", $("div.grid_6 input#YarisBilgileriHash").last().val());
                },
                complete: function (data, status) {
                    if (data.status == 200) {
                        $("div.grid_6").remove();
                        $("div.live-race").prepend(data.responseText);
                        if ($("div.grid_6").length > 1) {
                            $("div.grid_6").last().remove();
                        }
                        //$("select#race-city").dropp();
                        $("a.race-city").live("click", function () {
                            $("a.race-city").removeClass("race-city-active");
                            $("a.race-city").css("background", "#ffffff").css("color", "#1A1A1A");
                            $(this).addClass("race-city-active");
                            $(this).css("background", "#7D9F63");
                            $(this).css("color", "white");
                            $(".table-report").hide();
                            $(".table-penalty").hide();
                            $("h3.with-report").removeClass('collapse');
                            $("h3.with-penalty").removeClass('collapse');
                            $('.mainPageHidable').hide();
                            $('.mainPageHidable' + $(this).attr("name")).show();
                        });
                        $('.mainPageHidable').hide();
                        $('.mainPageHidable' + $('a.race-city:eq(' + activeLink + ')').attr("name")).show();
                        $("a.race-city:eq(" + activeLink + ")").addClass("race-city-active").css("background", "#7D9F63").css("color", "white");
                        $("a.race-city:eq(" + activeLink + ")").click();
                        $("h3.with-report").click(function () {
                            $(".table-report").toggle();
                            $("h3.with-report").toggleClass('collapse');
                        });
                        $("h3.with-penalty").click(function () {
                            $(".table-penalty").toggle();
                            $("h3.with-penalty").toggleClass('collapse');
                        });

                        var latestCity = $('a.race-city-active').text();

                        if (currentCity != latestCity) {
                            $('form.race-city ul.dropdown_list ').children().children(':contains(' + latestCity + ')').trigger('click');
                        } else {
                            $('a.race-city-active').trigger("click");
                            $('.mainPageHidable').hide();
                            $('.mainPageHidable' + $('a.race-city-active').attr("name")).show();
                        }

                    } else {

                    }
                }
            });
        }, 30000);
    });
</script>

<form action="/" method="post" class="coupon-query">            <h4 class="heading">
                Bilet Sorgulama
            </h4>
            <fieldset style="height">
                <legend>Bilet No</legend>
                <input type="text" name="tsn1" class="coupon-short" maxlength="1" style="width: 14px; padding-left: 2px; padding-right: 2px;">
                <input type="text" name="tsn2" maxlength="4" style="width: 37px; padding-left: 5px; padding-right: 5px;">
                <input type="text" name="tsn3" maxlength="4" style="width: 37px; padding-left: 5px; padding-right: 5px;">
                <input type="text" name="tsn4" maxlength="4" style="width: 37px; padding-left: 5px; padding-right: 5px;">
            </fieldset>
            <fieldset>
                <legend>Güvenlik Kodu</legend>
                <img id="-xcaptcha-image" class="captcha-code" src="/TR/YarisSever/YarisSever/CaptchaImage?encryptedSolution=Y%2bcTiAKRMPKZMBgyXft4og%3d%3d"><button id="-xcaptcha-refresh" title="Yenile" class="refresh-captcha"></button><input name="EncrypedSolution" id="-xcaptcha-hidden" type="hidden" value="Y%2bcTiAKRMPKZMBgyXft4og%3d%3d">
                <input type="text" class="captcha-input">
            </fieldset>
            <input type="button" class="btn query-submit gradient-red" value="Sorgula" style="float: right; border: none; margin-right: 7px;">
            <input type="button" value="Temizle" class="query-clear">
</form>            <div class="inputMessageBox" name="messageboxForTsn1" style="position: absolute; background-color: #444444; color: white; font-size: 9pt; width: 170px; height: 35px; padding: 4px; z-index: 2; margin-top: -105px; margin-left: 10px; display: none;">
                e-Bayi müşterilerinin bu haneyi girmelerine gerek yoktur.
            </div>

<a href="#" style="display: none;" id="hiddenLink">A</a>
<script type="text/javascript">
    //<![CDATA[
    if (!window.mvcClientValidationMetadata) { window.mvcClientValidationMetadata = []; }
    window.mvcClientValidationMetadata.push({ "Fields": [{ "FieldName": "Attempt", "ReplaceValidationMessageContents": true, "ValidationMessageId": "Attempt_validationMessage", "ValidationRules": [] }], "FormId": "form0", "ReplaceValidationSummary": true, "ValidationSummaryId": "validationSummary" });
    //]]>
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
    function xcaptchaChangeCaptchaImage() {
        var s = "/TR/YarisSever/YarisSever/EncryptedCaptchaSolution";
        var i = "/TR/YarisSever/YarisSever/CaptchaImage" + "?encryptedSolution=";
        xcaptchaSetCaptchaImage(s, i);
    };
    $(document).ready(function () { xcaptchaChangeCaptchaImage(); });
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
    $(document).ready(function () {
        $("div.coupon-query > form").addClass("coupon-query");
        $("#-xcaptcha-refresh").addClass("refresh-captcha");
        $("#-xcaptcha-image").addClass("captcha-code");
        $("input[name='tsn1']").focus(function () {
            $(".inputMessageBox[name='messageboxForTsn1']").show();
        });
        $("input[name='tsn1']").blur(function () {
            $(".inputMessageBox[name='messageboxForTsn1']").hide();
        });
        $('.query-submit').click(function (event) {
            var encSol = $("#-xcaptcha-hidden").val();
            var secCode = $(".captcha-input").val();
            var tsn = $("input[name='tsn1']").val() + $("input[name='tsn2']").val() + $("input[name='tsn3']").val() + $("input[name='tsn4']").val();
            if ((tsn.length < 13 && ($("input[name='tsn1']").val().toString().length != 0)) || tsn.length < 12) {
                alert("Bilet seri numarası eksiksiz olarak girilmelidir");

            }
            else {
                $.get("/TR/YarisSever/YarisSever/BiletSorgu", { tsn: "", sc: secCode, es: encSol }, function (result) {
                    if (result == "Fail") {
                        $(".refresh-captcha").trigger('click');
                        alert("Güvenlik kodu yanlış.");
                    }
                    else {
                        var win = window.open("/TR/YarisSever/YarisSever/BiletSorgu" + "?sc=" + secCode + "&es=" + encSol + "&tsn=" + tsn, "", "status=0,toolbar=0,location=0,menubar=0,resizable=0,scrollbars=0,height=600,width=550");
                        $("input[name^='tsn']").val("");
                        $(".refresh-captcha").trigger('click');
                    }
                });
            }
        });
        $('.query-clear').click(function () {
            $("input[name='tsn1']").val("");
            $("input[name='tsn2']").val("");
            $("input[name='tsn3']").val("");
            $("input[name='tsn4']").val("");
            $(".captcha-input").val("");
            $(".refresh-captcha").trigger('click');
        });
        $("input[name^='tsn'], input.captcha-input").keyup(function (e) {
            this.value = this.value.toUpperCase();
            if ($(this).val().length >= $(this).attr("maxlength") && $(this).attr("class") != "captcha-input") {
                $(this).next().focus();
                $(this).blur();
            }
        });
    });
</script>

    <script type="text/javascript">
        function closeBox(toClose) {
            document.getElementById(toClose).style.display = "none";
            setCookie(toClose, "closed", 365);
        }
        function setCookie(cName, value, expiredays) {
            var expDate = new Date();
            expDate.setDate(expDate.getDate() + expiredays);
            document.cookie = cName + "=" + escape(value) +
                ";expires=" + expDate.toGMTString();
        }
        function loadMsg(msgClass) {
            msg = document.getElementsByTagName("div");
            for (i = 0; i < msg.length; i++) {
                if (msg[i].className == msgClass) {
                    if (document.cookie.indexOf(msg[i].id) == -1) {
                        msg[i].style.display = "block";
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    </script>

    <script type="text/javascript">
        function isIpad() {
            const ua = window.navigator.userAgent;
            if (ua.indexOf('iPad') > -1) {
                return true;
            }
            if (ua.indexOf('Macintosh') > -1) {
                try {
                    document.createEvent("TouchEvent");
                    return true;
                } catch (e) { }
            }

            return false;
        }
    </script>

                            <script type="text/javascript">
                                $(function () {
                                    var BannerCheck = localStorage.getItem('BannerActiveV2')
                                    if (BannerCheck != "True") {
                                        var overlay = $('<div id="SSS"></div>');
                                        overlay.show();
                                        overlay.appendTo(document.body);
                                        $('.popup').show();
                                        //setTimeout(() => { if (!document.querySelector('video') != null) { document.querySelector('video').muted = false; } }, 500);
                                    }
                                    else {
                                        document.body.style.overflow = 'auto';
                                    }

                                    $('.NoReplay').click(function () {
                                        if (document.querySelector('video') != null && document.querySelector('video') != undefined) {
                                            if (!document.querySelector('video').muted) {
                                                document.querySelector('video').muted = true;
                                            }
                                            if (document.querySelector('video').played) {
                                                document.querySelector('video').pause();
                                            }

                                        }
                                        $('.popup').hide();
                                        document.body.style.overflow = 'auto';
                                        overlay.appendTo(document.body).remove();
                                        localStorage.setItem('BannerActiveV2', 'True')
                                        return false;
                                    });

                                    $('.close').click(function () {
                                        if (document.querySelector('video') != null && document.querySelector('video') != undefined) {
                                            if (!document.querySelector('video').muted) {
                                                document.querySelector('video').muted = true;
                                            }
                                            if (document.querySelector('video').played) {
                                                document.querySelector('video').pause();
                                            }
                                        }
                                        $('.popup').hide();
                                        document.body.style.overflow = 'auto';
                                        overlay.appendTo(document.body).remove();
                                        return false;
                                    });
                                });
                            </script>

            //$(document).ready(function () {

            //        $("#gaziBanner").css("display", "none");
            //        $("#GaziSayacBanner").css("display", "block");
            //        $("#countdowncontainer").css("margin-top", "16px");
            //    }
            //    else {
            //        $("#gaziBanner").css("display", "block");
            //        $("#GaziSayacBanner").css("display", "none");
            //        $("#countdowncontainer").css("margin-top", "30px");
            //    }

            //    $("#pageflip").hover(function () {
            //        $("#pageflip img , .msg_block").stop().animate({
            //            width: '370px',

            //        }, 500);
            //        $(" .msg_block").stop().animate({
            //            width: '338px',

            //        }, 500);
            //    }, function () {
            //        $("#pageflip img").stop().animate({
            //            width: '175px',
            //            height: '135px'

            //            width: '170px',
            //            height: '130px'
            //        }, 200);

        <script>
            $(document).ready(function () {

                var ua = navigator.userAgent;
                if (ua.indexOf("Mobile") > -1 || ua.indexOf("iPad") > -1 || ua.indexOf("Android") > -1 || isIpad()) {

                    $("#gaziBanner").css("display", "none");
                    $("#GaziSayacBanner").css("display", "block");
                    $("#countdowncontainer").css("margin-top", "16px");
                }
                else {
                    $("#gaziBanner").css("display", "block");
                    $("#GaziSayacBanner").css("display", "block");
                    $("#countdowncontainer").css("margin-top", "30px");
                }

                $("#pageflip").hover(function () {
                    $("#pageflip img , .msg_block").stop().animate({
                        width: '370px',
                        height: '170px'
                    }, 500);
                    $(" .msg_block").stop().animate({
                        width: '338px',
                        height: '160px'
                    }, 500);
                }, function () {
                    $("#pageflip img").stop().animate({
                        width: '175px',
                        height: '135px'
                    }, 220);
                    $(".msg_block").stop().animate({
                        width: '170px',
                        height: '130px'
                    }, 200);
                });
            });

        </script>
        <div id="gaziBanner" style="display: block;">
            <div id="pageflip">
                <a target="_blank" href="https://ebayi.tjk.org/">
                    <img src="https://medya-cdn.tjk.org/medyaftp/page/page_flip.png" id="gaziPageFlipImg" alt="Mikrofon Sende">
                </a>
            </div>

            <div class="grid_11">

                <div class="i18n">
                        <div style="right:0; position:absolute;">

    <script type="text/javascript">
        $('#result-tabs-131').tabs('#result-panes-131 > div', {effect: 'ajax'}); var api = $('#result-tabs-131').data('tabs');api.click('#altiliSonuc');
    </script>
        <script type="text/javascript">
            var activeRace;
            var refreshIntervalTables = window.setInterval(function() {
                var $activeLink = $("ul#result-tabs-131 li a.current");
                var href = $activeLink.attr("href");
                var sehirId = ((href.split("?")[1]).split("&", 2))[0].split("=")[1];




            $.ajaxSetup({'cache':true});

                $.ajax({
                    url: href,
					cache:true,
                    beforeSend: function(request) {
                        request.setRequestHeader("Content-Hash", $("div.result-panes div input#DataHash").val());
			var lastUpdatedTime = new Date();
                        $("span#LastUpdated").html("(Son Güncelleme " + pad(lastUpdatedTime.getHours(), 2) + ":" + pad(lastUpdatedTime.getMinutes(), 2)+")");
                    },
                    complete: function(data, status) {
                        if (data.status == 200) {
                            var activeIndex = 0;
                            if ($activeLink.parent().index() > 2) { // there is another li which is not a part of the tabs
                             activeIndex = $activeLink.parent().index() - 1;
                            }

                            $('div#result-panes-' + sehirId + ' div').remove();
                            $(data.responseText).appendTo('div#result-panes-' + sehirId);

                            $('ul#result-tabs-' + sehirId).tabs('#result-panes-' + sehirId + ' >div', { effect: 'ajax', initialIndex:activeIndex });
                        } else {

                        }
                    }
                });
            }, 30000);
        </script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    $(document).ready(function () {
        

        var refreshIntervalRaces = window.setInterval(function () {
         
            var currentCity = $('a.race-city-active').text();
            var activeLi = $('.anasayfaHipodromTablar >li').find('a.race-city.race-city-active');
            var activeLink = activeLi.index('.anasayfaHipodromTablar >li >a');


            $.ajax({
               cache:true,
                url: "/TR/YarisSever/YarisSever/AnasayfaYarisBilgileri",
                beforeSend: function (request) {
                    request.setRequestHeader("Content-Hash", $("div.grid_6 input#YarisBilgileriHash").last().val());
                },
                complete: function (data, status) {
                    if (data.status == 200) {
                        $("div.grid_6").remove();
                        $("div.live-race").prepend(data.responseText);
                        if ($("div.grid_6").length > 1) {
                            $("div.grid_6").last().remove();
                        }
                        //$("select#race-city").dropp();
                        $("a.race-city").live("click", function () {
                            $("a.race-city").removeClass("race-city-active");
                            $("a.race-city").css("background", "#ffffff").css("color", "#1A1A1A");
                            $(this).addClass("race-city-active");
                            $(this).css("background", "#7D9F63");
                            $(this).css("color", "white");
                            $(".table-report").hide();
                            $(".table-penalty").hide();
                            $("h3.with-report").removeClass('collapse');
                            $("h3.with-penalty").removeClass('collapse');
                            $('.mainPageHidable').hide();
                            $('.mainPageHidable' + $(this).attr("name")).show();
                        });
                        $('.mainPageHidable').hide();
                        $('.mainPageHidable' + $('a.race-city:eq(' + activeLink + ')').attr("name")).show();
                        $("a.race-city:eq(" + activeLink + ")").addClass("race-city-active").css("background", "#7D9F63").css("color", "white");
                        $("a.race-city:eq(" + activeLink + ")").click();
                        $("h3.with-report").click(function () {
                            $(".table-report").toggle();
                            $("h3.with-report").toggleClass('collapse');
                        });
                        $("h3.with-penalty").click(function () {
                            $(".table-penalty").toggle();
                            $("h3.with-penalty").toggleClass('collapse');
                        });

                        var latestCity = $('a.race-city-active').text();

                        if (currentCity != latestCity) {
                            $('form.race-city ul.dropdown_list ').children().children(':contains(' + latestCity + ')').trigger('click');
                        } else {
                            $('a.race-city-active').trigger("click");
                            $('.mainPageHidable').hide();
                            $('.mainPageHidable' + $('a.race-city-active').attr("name")).show();
                        }

                    } else {

                    }
                }
            });
        }, 30000);
    });
</script>

                                <p>
					<a href="/TR/YarisSever/News/Page/46986">
	                                   <img src="https://medya-cdn.tjk.org/haberftp/2024/koyuncuoglukosusu28324bnnr.jpg" alt="Turgut Koyuncuoğlu Koşusu'nu Colour Of Light kazandı">
					</a>
                                </p>
                                <p>
                               2022 yılında aramızdan ayrılan Asli Üyemiz merhum Turgut Koyuncuoğlu adına koşulan yarış (KV-7) 28 Mart Perşembe günü saat 15.30'da start aldı.
				<br><span class="news-more"><a class="news-continue btn gradient-red" href="/TR/YarisSever/News/Page/46986">
Devamını Oku                
                
                
                </a>&nbsp;<a class="all-news btn gradient-blue" href="/TR/YarisSever/Query/Page/Haberler?QueryParameter_IsYarisSever=1&amp;QueryParameter_InTurkish=1">
Tüm Haberler                </a> </span>
                                </p>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="page">
                <!-- inner scrollable #1 -->
                <div class="scrollable">
                    <!-- root element for scrollable items -->
                        <div class="items">
                            <div class="item">
                                
                                <p>
					<a href="/TR/YarisSever/News/Page/46981">
	                                   <img src="https://medya-cdn.tjk.org/haberftp/2024/aniyoruzmht29324.jpg" alt="Merhum Asli Üyemiz Muhittin Ekiz'i saygıyla anıyoruz">
					</a>
                                </p>
                                <p>
                               2018 yılında kaybettiğimiz Asli Üyemiz Muhittin Ekiz'i 29 Mart Cuma günü İzmir Şirinyer Hipodromu'nda saat 21.30'da anısına düzenlenecek koşu vesilesiyle bir kez daha saygı ve rahmetle anacağız...
				<br><span class="news-more"><a class="news-continue btn gradient-red" href="/TR/YarisSever/News/Page/46981">

<form action="/" method="post" class="coupon-query">            <h4 class="heading">
                Bilet Sorgulama
            </h4>
            <fieldset style="height">
                <legend>Bilet No</legend>
                <input type="text" name="tsn1" class="coupon-short" maxlength="1" style="width: 14px; padding-left: 2px; padding-right: 2px;">
                <input type="text" name="tsn2" maxlength="4" style="width: 37px; padding-left: 5px; padding-right: 5px;">
                <input type="text" name="tsn3" maxlength="4" style="width: 37px; padding-left: 5px; padding-right: 5px;">
                <input type="text" name="tsn4" maxlength="4" style="width: 37px; padding-left: 5px; padding-right: 5px;">
            </fieldset>
            <fieldset>
                <legend>Güvenlik Kodu</legend>
                <img id="-xcaptcha-image" class="captcha-code" src="/TR/YarisSever/YarisSever/CaptchaImage?encryptedSolution=WO9wzQKBfS8qfJHcGNWzxA%3d%3d"><button id="-xcaptcha-refresh" title="Yenile" class="refresh-captcha"></button><input name="EncrypedSolution" id="-xcaptcha-hidden" type="hidden" value="WO9wzQKBfS8qfJHcGNWzxA%3d%3d">
                <input type="text" class="captcha-input">
            </fieldset>
            <input type="button" class="btn query-submit gradient-red" value="Sorgula" style="float: right; border: none; margin-right: 7px;">
            <input type="button" value="Temizle" class="query-clear">
</form>            <div class="inputMessageBox" name="messageboxForTsn1" style="position: absolute; background-color: #444444; color: white; font-size: 9pt; width: 170px; height: 35px; padding: 4px; z-index: 2; margin-top: -105px; margin-left: 10px; display: none;">
                e-Bayi müşterilerinin bu haneyi girmelerine gerek yoktur.
            </div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    //<![CDATA[
    if (!window.mvcClientValidationMetadata) { window.mvcClientValidationMetadata = []; }
    window.mvcClientValidationMetadata.push({ "Fields": [{ "FieldName": "Attempt", "ReplaceValidationMessageContents": true, "ValidationMessageId": "Attempt_validationMessage", "ValidationRules": [] }], "FormId": "form0", "ReplaceValidationSummary": true, "ValidationSummaryId": "validationSummary" });
    //]]>
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
    function xcaptchaChangeCaptchaImage() {
        var s = "/TR/YarisSever/YarisSever/EncryptedCaptchaSolution";
        var i = "/TR/YarisSever/YarisSever/CaptchaImage" + "?encryptedSolution=";
        xcaptchaSetCaptchaImage(s, i);
    };
    $(document).ready(function () { xcaptchaChangeCaptchaImage(); });
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
    $(document).ready(function () {
        $("div.coupon-query > form").addClass("coupon-query");
        $("#-xcaptcha-refresh").addClass("refresh-captcha");
        $("#-xcaptcha-image").addClass("captcha-code");
        $("input[name='tsn1']").focus(function () {
            $(".inputMessageBox[name='messageboxForTsn1']").show();
        });
        $("input[name='tsn1']").blur(function () {
            $(".inputMessageBox[name='messageboxForTsn1']").hide();
        });
        $('.query-submit').click(function (event) {
            var encSol = $("#-xcaptcha-hidden").val();
            var secCode = $(".captcha-input").val();
            var tsn = $("input[name='tsn1']").val() + $("input[name='tsn2']").val() + $("input[name='tsn3']").val() + $("input[name='tsn4']").val();
            if ((tsn.length < 13 && ($("input[name='tsn1']").val().toString().length != 0)) || tsn.length < 12) {
                alert("Bilet seri numarası eksiksiz olarak girilmelidir");

            }
            else {
                $.get("/TR/YarisSever/YarisSever/BiletSorgu", { tsn: "", sc: secCode, es: encSol }, function (result) {
                    if (result == "Fail") {
                        $(".refresh-captcha").trigger('click');
                        alert("Güvenlik kodu yanlış.");
                    }
                    else {
                        var win = window.open("/TR/YarisSever/YarisSever/BiletSorgu" + "?sc=" + secCode + "&es=" + encSol + "&tsn=" + tsn, "", "status=0,toolbar=0,location=0,menubar=0,resizable=0,scrollbars=0,height=600,width=550");
                        $("input[name^='tsn']").val("");
                        $(".refresh-captcha").trigger('click');
                    }
                });
            }
        });
        $('.query-clear').click(function () {
            $("input[name='tsn1']").val("");
            $("input[name='tsn2']").val("");
            $("input[name='tsn3']").val("");
            $("input[name='tsn4']").val("");
            $(".captcha-input").val("");
            $(".refresh-captcha").trigger('click');
        });
        $("input[name^='tsn'], input.captcha-input").keyup(function (e) {
            this.value = this.value.toUpperCase();
            if ($(this).val().length >= $(this).attr("maxlength") && $(this).attr("class") != "captcha-input") {
                $(this).next().focus();
                $(this).blur();
            }
        });
    });
</script>
